## The Green Chronicle {#the-green-chronicle dir="auto" tabindex="-1"}

[](#the-green-chronicle){#user-content-the-green-chronicle aria-label="Permalink: The Green Chronicle"}

[![Nuxt UI Pro](https://camo.githubusercontent.com/f096f72dbc3a82fd2d6d8bd4adfb03d6fd5928f1699732a878dac184341842a4/68747470733a2f2f696d672e736869656c64732e696f2f62616467652f4d616465253230776974682d4e757874253230554925323050726f2d3030444338323f6c6f676f3d6e7578742e6a73266c6162656c436f6c6f723d303230343230){canonical-src="https://img.shields.io/badge/Made%20with-Nuxt%20UI%20Pro-00DC82?logo=nuxt.js&labelColor=020420"}](https://ui.nuxt.com/pro){rel="nofollow"}

The Green Chronicle is a blog theme for **company** that you can use in [Nuxt Studio](https://nuxt.studio/){rel="nofollow"}.

It is powered by [Nuxt Content](https://content.nuxt.com/){rel="nofollow"} and [Nuxt UI Pro](https://ui.nuxt.com/pro){rel="nofollow"}!

## Setup {#setup dir="auto" tabindex="-1"}

[](#setup){#user-content-setup aria-label="Permalink: Setup"}

Make sure to install the dependencies:

## Development Server {#development-server dir="auto" tabindex="-1"}

[](#development-server){#user-content-development-server aria-label="Permalink: Development Server"}

Start the development server on `http://localhost:3000`:

## Production {#production dir="auto" tabindex="-1"}

[](#production){#user-content-production aria-label="Permalink: Production"}

In order to build the application for production, you need to have a [Nuxt UI Pro](https://ui.nuxt.com/pro){rel="nofollow"} license and set the `NUXT_UI_PRO_LICENSE` variable in the `.env` file.

Note that this is not required to run in development and contribute to the Nuxt website or documentation.

Build the application for production:
